# `create_delaunayNetwork_geometry`

create_delaunayNetwork_geometry


## Description

Create a spatial Delaunay network.


## Usage

```r
create_delaunayNetwork_geometry(
  spatial_locations,
  sdimx = "sdimx",
  sdimy = "sdimy",
  options = "Pp",
  ...
)
```
